articles.author: Miranda Nazzaro
articles.title: 2023 on track to be hottest year on record, data indicate - The Hill
articles.description: 2023 is on track to be the hottest year on record, following a summer of record-breaking temperatures and a particularly warm September, according to the European Environment Agency. Last month saw “unprecedented” temperatures, pushing 2023 on its way to beco…
